name: Grasshopper - Array Mean
description: ## Find Mean Find the mean (average) of a list of numbers in an array. ## Information To find the mean (average) of a set of numbers add all of the numbers together and divide by the number of values in the list. For an example list of `1, 3, 5, 7` 1. Add all of the numbers ``` 1+3+5+7 = 16 ``` 2. Divide by the number of values in the list. In this example there are 4 numbers in the list. ``` 16/4 = 4 ``` 3. The mean (or average) of this list is 4
